properties.name: ad_asset_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the ad asset.

properties.name: ad_load_type
properties.description: Linear if ads are same for all users.

properties.name: ad_pod_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the ad pod.

properties.name: ad_pod_position
properties.description: Position of the ad asset relative to other assets in the same pod.

properties.name: ad_position
properties.description: The current index position in seconds of the playhead with respect to the length of the ad.

properties.name: ad_publisher
properties.description: The ad creator, author, producer, or publisher.

properties.name: ad_title
properties.description: The title of the video ad.

properties.name: session_id
properties.description: The unique ID of the overall session.

properties.name: total_ad_length
properties.description: The total duration of the current ad asset in seconds.
